function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate governance leading to crowded urban green spaces","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Implementing crowd control measures, setting capacity limits, and promoting social distancing guidelines","Technologies":"Advanced surveillance systems, crowd monitoring apps, and communication technologies","People":"Visitors to urban green spaces","Owner":"Local government and park management authorities"},{"Description":"Lack of coordination in decision-making about urban green spaces","Impact":"Inefficient use of green spaces, leading to potential overcrowding and maintenance issues","Mitigation":"Establishing clear decision-making processes, promoting stakeholder collaboration, and fostering community engagement","Technologies":"Collaborative digital platforms, GIS mapping tools, and communication technologies","People":"Government agencies, non-governmental stakeholders, and local communities","Owner":"Urban planning authorities and community organizations"}]}
